taskName: Kickoff & Discovery: P1. Short Problem Statement

before.task_name: Kickoff & Discovery: P1. Short Problem Statement
before.description: Define the core problem the roadmap integration should solve: Users think in goals, not taxonomies; landing page is a giant list without structure, hierarchy, or narrative.
requisites: Access to existing roadmap content and links
Agreement on target audience and scope
before.expected_output: A concise problem statement (<= 1 page) describing the user problem, current pain, and why a roadmap UI is needed; include assumptions and out-of-scope notes.
before.goal: Create shared alignment on the core problem to solve before research and design begin.
before.self_assign_instructions: Comment on linked issue to claim the task and add your GitHub handle.

acceptance_criteria: A concise problem statement (<= 1 page) describing the user problem, current pain, and why a roadmap UI is needed; include assumptions and out-of-scope notes.
verification_steps: Peer review output against goal + expected_output
